game.name: Tank Fantastic
game.shortDescription: Tank Fantastic is an indie arcade game made in 2.5D graphics and Sci-Fi style.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Tank Fantastic is an indie arcade game made in 2.5D graphics and Sci-Fi style.

reviewHighlights.text: Uhhhhh... Not so much on the "Fantastic" part. Top down tank game in sort of mild maze areas with some limited destructable terrain. There, that's out...
[quote][b][url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asset_flip]Warning: Asset Flip![/url][/b] Tank Fantastic is a Digital Homicide style asset flip, or what...
